item.title: Week 5: Hidden Assumptions: Epistemology, Pedagogy, and Assessment
item.description: Learning analytics is like an iceberg, with a myriad of assumptions hidden under the water.

item.title: Week 4: Theory and Learning Analytics
item.description: Learning analytics are about learning, so theories of learning should not be ditched despite the data deluge that has been fueling the growth of learning analytics.

item.title: Week 3: Ethics, Algorithmic Accountability, and System Integrity
item.description: Ethics, algorithmic accountability, and system integrity in learning analytics

item.title: Week 2: Learning Analytics: A Brief Overview
item.description: What problems does learning analytics seek to address? In which educational settings? At which levels of an education system?
